ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New games
ygData.msgSnippet: It all depends on the features and just how affordable it is. What kind of features are you looking at and are you up for some suggestions? If you want to get
ygData.messageBody:
It all depends on the features and just how affordable it is.
What kind of features are you looking at and are you up for some
suggestions?
If you want to get into alot of specifics you can email me off-list.
I was actually thinking of starting a thread on what people would want to
see in a game if they could modify or create their own game. Anyone up for
that?
luv,
-Su

> Im gonna be working with some ppl that i know that are gonna be
> creating a new game based around everquest there is no name for the
> game as of yet but i was wondering if any of you would be willing to
> spend your money and you time playing another game that is alot like
> everquest.
>
> Qanaesin Truehearted
> Vicar of the 52nd Season
> Vallon Zek server
>
